amendment.description: To provide that an eligible beneficiary is not responsible for paying the applicable percent of the monthly national average premium while the beneficiary is in the coverage gap and to sunset the bill, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 956 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 56. Record Vote Number: 244.

action.text: Amendment SA 956 proposed by Senator Graham FL. (consideration: CR S8273-8277; text: CR S8273-8274) To provide that an eligible beneficiary is not responsible for paying the applicable percent of the monthly national average premium while the beneficiary is in the coverage gap and to sunset the bill, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 956 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 56. Record Vote Number: 244.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 956 proposed by Senator Graham FL.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 956 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 56. Record Vote Number: 244.
